metadata.title: CVE-2024-36967 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:KEYS: trusted: Fix memory leak in tpm2_key_encode()'scratch' is never freed. Fix this by calling kfree() in the success, andin the error case.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
